title: about
firstSentence: As a developer, I am always curious about web development technologies. Building functional, modern and user-friendly web applications is definitely a passion of mine. To be more valuable in this highly competitive software development world, I actively equip myself advanced and up-to-date technologies.
secondSentence: I am looking for an opportunity to become a Front-end/Full-stack Developer and I am very open to relocate to Canada.
focusTech: Node.js / React / Redux and other frameworks, libraries related to them.
